title: Order Listing Photography
description: For a new listing, the agent needs to schedule a professional photographer.

tasks.description: Identify the property address and the preferred real estate photographer from the vendor list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects the correct property and photographer.

tasks.description: Contact the photographer to check their availability and schedule the photoshoot.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the photographer for a specific date and time.

tasks.description: Confirm the appointment with the seller and add it to their calendar.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent coordinates with the seller and updates their calendar.
